headline: The Mosaic Company (MOS) Faces Mixed Reviews as 2026 Forecast Looms
summary: The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) is among the ridiculously cheap stocks to buy now. As of December 26, The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) has mixed analyst sentiment, with 57% of the analysts covering the stock assigning a Buy rating and the remaining 43% recommending holding the stock.
